Reviews.Title: Good Laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Muqsith
Reviews.Content: Pros: good build. and configuration is sufficient for moderate day to day work loads (email, internet, wordprocessing, multimedia). Nice finsihing.cons:  For the price - No complaint. (It is not expected to be a high end gaming machine or workstation)

Reviews.Title: Verry Happy
Reviews.Author: Toni Stavrinos
Reviews.Content: I will recomend this product, it is a great laptop.My son uses it for school, it is light and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: The screen flickers on and off if the laptop is moved or touched. Acer had me ship it to their repair center at my expense. It was returned to me two weeks later, supposedly "fixed". I turned it on and the screen flickers much worse than before. I have once again shipped it back to Acer for repair. NO apology, no offer of simply replacing the item for a working computer. I emailed the company asking for help & nobody has responded. Customer service is awful. What a frustrating experience!

Reviews.Title: received under the sale was conducted according to the agreement. as fully thanks
Reviews.Author: tirso v.
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD Acer. received under the sale was conducted according to the agreement. as fully thanksAspire E1-571-6481 15.6-Inch Laptop (Glossy Black)

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: KOBAM
Reviews.Content: My wife really loves this computer it is light enough to hold in her lap and yet substantial enough to not feel like it will break apart at any moment.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Abdul Ahad Khan
Reviews.Content: i love it, looking good, price is good, any body can buy this item, i suggest u can buy it.

Reviews.Title: Very good computer.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Salisbury
Reviews.Content: It is turning out to be a good computer.  The only problem I had is getting my software install.  I would suggest that Acer recommend an outfit to go to for software help.  They are all from India but which one is the best.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: I really like this laptop its good, just what I needed good price I love windows 8 its really not that bad it just takes time to get used to it

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Freddy G. Sanchez
Reviews.Content: Muy buena laptop, rapida, liviana, sencilla, acabados muy sobrios y elegantes,  son personas responsables en el envio, caja selladaSaludos desde Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Acer Aspire
Reviews.Author: margaret mcqueen
Reviews.Content: I need more training to enjoy the full range 0f possibilities. This is probably more than I need for the limited ways I use the computer.
